member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the stage of a parameter to a meta command.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE_CREATION
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is used at the meta command creation stage.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE_INITIALIZATION
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is used at the meta command initialization stage.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_STAGE_EXECUTION
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is used at the meta command execution stage.
